objective: Dynamic 0-100 trust bar with real-time confidence scoring

confidence_calculation.description: Weighted score: ETag (30%) + ACK (30%) + Schema (20%) + Freshness (20%)
confidence_calculation.acceptance: Score calculated within 300ms of proof.updated event

visual_feedback.description: Color-coded progress bar: emerald (≥80%), amber (≥50%), rose (<50%)
visual_feedback.acceptance: Bar color and width update based on confidence score

factor_display.description: Shows individual factors: ETag, ACK, Schema, Freshness with checkmarks
factor_display.acceptance: Factor indicators display ✓/○ with appropriate colors

real_time_updates.description: Listens for proof.updated custom events and recalculates

telemetry_emission.description: Emits ui.confidence.score with score and factors
telemetry_emission.acceptance: Telemetry includes confidence, factors, and elapsedMs

governance.criterion: Tower Federation - ACK & ETag freshness validation
